name: Rooftop Shooter
description:
Run on rooftops. Get score. You always get score, but you can get more by killing enemies, or finding an orb. But don't fall off the roofs! Otherwise, you die. Have fun shooting the enemies, and get as much score as you can!  🙂

Controls:

Move the mouse to look around.

Space: Jump

Left mouse button: Shoot with gun

Esc: Exit/Quit/Back
